wiki.summary: “HEARTBREAK ANNIVERSARY” is GIVĒON’s first release of 2020, also dropped on his 25th birthday, which is centered on the anniversary of a heartbreak. It serves as the second single to Take Time. GIVĒON stated that the song is written from the perspective of a close friend on an episode of Genius VERIFIED. The same perspective was used on his November 2019 hit single “LIKE I WANT YOU,” a previous single released from the EP. So “HEARTBREAK ANNIVERSARY” is just the anniversary of a heartbreak. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: “HEARTBREAK ANNIVERSARY” is GIVĒON’s first release of 2020, also dropped on his 25th birthday, which is centered on the anniversary of a heartbreak. It serves as the second single to Take Time. GIVĒON stated that the song is written from the perspective of a close friend on an episode of Genius VERIFIED. The same perspective was used on his November 2019 hit single “LIKE I WANT YOU,” a previous single released from the EP. So “HEARTBREAK ANNIVERSARY” is just the anniversary of a heartbreak. Say you guys are heartbroken on Valentine’s Day, February 14th. Every time Valentine’s Day comes around you kinda revisit the pain and revisit the sorrow. So with this song, I tried to make pain sound beautiful. – Givēon via BET Her Read more on Last.fm.
